text: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ

translation.en: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains
translation.id: Dan sungguh, mereka telah membuat tipu daya padahal Allah (mengetahui dan akan membalas) tipu daya mereka. Dan sesungguhnya tipu daya mereka tidak mampu melenyapkan gunung-gunung
